column3: I-64 at 108 MM in Montgomery Co:
column4: The roadway is shutdown in both directions due to a multi-vehicle collision.  Detours are in place.

column3: I-64 at 108 MM in Montgomery Co:
column4: Eastbound traffic should use Exit 101 to US-60 to KY-686 to US-460.  Westbound traffic should use Exit 110 to US-460 to KY-686 to US-60.
